Package app.controller

Class ValidationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controller.ValidationController
  • public class ValidationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows the System to control the action of validating a Test.
    Author:
    AndrÃ© Soares <1201314@isep.ipp.pt>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Company company
      Object of the Company class,where the store objects are saved
      private TestToBeValidatedList testToBeValidatedList
      Object of the class TestToBeValidatedList where the tests to be validated will be stored

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ValidationController()
      Allows the initialization of an ValidationController with the company returned from "App.getInstance().getCompany()" while also initializing a
      ValidationController​(Company company)
      Allows the initialization of an ValidationController using the parameter company while also initializing a new testToBeValidatedList object where the test to be validated will be stored

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createListWithAllTestsAvailableToBeValidated()
      Allows the insertion of all the tests available to be validated in the system in a testToBeValidatedList object
      java.util.List<TestDto> getListOfUnvalidatedTestsDto()
      Allows the creation of a list of TestDto objects from the a list of Test objects that are available to be validated
      boolean saveTestInListByNhsCode​(java.lang.String nhsCode)
      Allows the save of test object in a testToBeValidatedList object using only nhsCode that identifies a Test object
      void validateTestsInsideTestsToBeValidatedList()
      Allows the validation of all the Test class object inside a valid testToBeValidatedList object,while also sending a text to the txt file emailAndSMSMessages.txt containing some information about the test being validated(NHSCODE) and the client the test belongs too(Email,Name).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createListWithAllTestsAvailableToBeValidated

        public void createListWithAllTestsAvailableToBeValidated()
        Allows the insertion of all the tests available to be validated in the system in a testToBeValidatedList object

      • saveTestInListByNhsCode

        public boolean saveTestInListByNhsCode​(java.lang.String nhsCode)
        Allows the save of test object in a testToBeValidatedList object using only nhsCode that identifies a Test object
        Parameters:
        nhsCode - nhs code that identifies a certain test
        Returns:
        boolean statement,true if the save of the test in the testToBeValidatedList was successful ,false if not

      • validateTestsInsideTestsToBeValidatedList

        public void validateTestsInsideTestsToBeValidatedList()
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Allows the validation of all the Test class object inside a valid testToBeValidatedList object,while also sending a text to the txt file emailAndSMSMessages.txt containing some information about the test being validated(NHSCODE) and the client the test belongs too(Email,Name).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getListOfUnvalidatedTestsDto

        public java.util.List<TestDto> getListOfUnvalidatedTestsDto()
        Allows the creation of a list of TestDto objects from the a list of Test objects that are available to be validated
        Returns:
        list composed by TestDTO objects
